about.label: The Founder
about.title: Agnes Kah - My Heart Beats for Africa
about.paragraph1: Africa touched me for the first time in 2009. What began as curiosity became passion and finally my calling.

paragraph2.bold: I don't travel to Africa – I live there.
paragraph2.text: I have personally traveled every route over 10 times. I know the families who host us. I know where the best sunsets are and which encounters will touch your heart.

about.paragraph3: My mission: To show you Africa as I love it – authentic, respectful, and with genuine encounters that will change you.

items.sarah: Agnes showed us Africa as it really is. The 3 days with the Baka were the most intense experience of my life. Not a show, but real life.
items.michael: I've been on many trips, but this was different. Small group, personal care and encounters on equal footing. Thank you Agnes!
items.anna: The beaches of Sierra Leone are paradise - and almost deserted! Agnes knows every corner and showed us places no guidebook knows.
